minidraw.standard
Class GroupFigure

java.lang.Object
  minidraw.standard.AbstractFigure
      minidraw.standard.CompositeFigure
          minidraw.standard.GroupFigure
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, Figure, FigureChangeListener
public class GroupFigure
extends CompositeFigure

A Group figure is a fully operational figure containing other figures. Implementation based on JHotDraw 5.1

Method Detail

displayBox

public java.awt.Rectangle displayBox()
Description copied from interface: Figure
Return the display box of this figure. The display box is the smallest rectangle that completely contains the figure.

Returns:
the display box.
